original: @20b * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @20b * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs pa bsags pa'i thabs la /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs pa bsags pa'i thabs la /
translated: The method for gathering the accumulations through the seven limbs of the praise in genuine words:

original: 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa //
translated: Mañjuśrī Vajra and so forth,

original: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la //
translated: the victors and their bodhisattva heirs,

original: lus ngag yid gsum gus ldan pas //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum gus ldan pas //
translated: with body, speech, and mind full of devotion,

original: kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow down and pay homage to them all.🔽Whatever is praised as a buddha field,

original: sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags dang // 'jig rten dag na mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags dang // 'jig rten dag na mchog gyur pa //
translated: and whatever is supreme in the world,

original: rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs //
analyzed: rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs //
translated: precious jewels, flowers, incense, and so forth,

original: kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi //
analyzed: kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi //
translated: I emanate all of these and make offerings.🔽All the negative actions I have done in the past,

original: bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig / kun nas bsags par gang gyur pa //🔽rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis //
analyzed: bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig / kun nas bsags par gang gyur pa // rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis //
translated: whatever I have accumulated,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar bshags //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar bshags //
translated: in the presence of all the victors,🔽I confess them with the understanding of their lack of inherent nature.🔽The merit of the protectors,

original: mgon po rnams kyi bsod nams dang / dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la //
analyzed: mgon po rnams kyi bsod nams dang / dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la //
translated: and all the virtue of the lowly,

analyzed: de bzhin mthun par lhag sems kyis //
translated: with a superior mind in accord with that,

original: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in them with faith.

original: bde gshegs byang chub sems bskyed nas //
analyzed: bde gshegs byang chub sems bskyed nas //
translated: Having generated the mind of enlightenment,

original: 'gro ba thugs rjes 'dul slad du //
analyzed: 'gro ba thugs rjes 'dul slad du //
translated: for the sake of taming beings with compassion,🔽I request you, like Brahma,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la //🔽tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs //🔽yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed la //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la // tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs // yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed la //
translated: to turn the wheel of dharma.

analyzed: 'gro ba yun du bde ba'i phyir // ji srid 'khor ba de srid du // mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
translated: For the sake of the long-term happiness of beings,🔽I request you, who wish to pass into parinirvana,🔽to not pass into nirvana,🔽but to remain for as long as samsara.

original: ji srid 'khor bar gnas par du //
analyzed: ji srid 'khor bar gnas par du //
translated: For as long as I remain in samsara,

original: bdag gi dge pa'ang de bzhin du //
analyzed: bdag gi dge pa'ang de bzhin du //
translated: may my virtue likewise

original: kun nas zad par mi 'gyur bar //
analyzed: kun nas zad par mi 'gyur bar //
translated: never be exhausted,🔽but ripen all sentient beings.

original: sems can yongs su smin par shog / dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par shog / dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su //
translated: From this time forth

original: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
analyzed: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
translated: until I reach the essence of enlightenment,

original: mgon po'i 'bangs su 'bul lags kyis //
analyzed: mgon po'i 'bangs su 'bul lags kyis //
translated: I offer myself to you, O protector,

original: thugs rjes yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
analyzed: thugs rjes yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
translated: so please accept me with compassion.

original: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su //🔽bde gshegs khyed kyi bka' bzhin du //
analyzed: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su // bde gshegs khyed kyi bka' bzhin du //
translated: From this time forth🔽I will accomplish the welfare of all beings

original: sems can kun don sgrub lags kyis //
analyzed: sems can kun don sgrub lags kyis //
translated: in accordance with your words, O Sugata,

original: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
translated: so please grant your blessings.

original: rgyal ba mnyes phyir bzlas brjod rin po che //
analyzed: rgyal ba mnyes phyir bzlas brjod rin po che //
translated: For the sake of pleasing the Victorious Ones, I will recite the precious mantras.

original: dang pas spyan sngar rtag tu mchod bgyid pas //
analyzed: dang pas spyan sngar rtag tu mchod bgyid pas //
translated: First, I will always make offerings in their presence.

original: lus ngag dub dang bsam pa yengs pa yis //
analyzed: lus ngag dub dang bsam pa yengs pa yis //
translated: Please bear with me if my body and speech are tired and my thoughts are distracted,

analyzed: cung zad bde bar gnas 'tshal bzod par bzhes // dad pas bskyed pa'i bsod nams phra mo @21a * //
translated: and I rest for a little while in comfort.🔽For the sake of ensuring that not even the slightest merit

original: yang // 'ga' yang chud zos mi 'gyur don gyi phyir //
analyzed: yang // 'ga' yang chud zos mi 'gyur don gyi phyir //
translated: generated through faith goes to waste,

analyzed: gsang sngags rin chen rnam grangs ji tsam zhig / mgon po bdag nyid la ni gdams par bgyi //
translated: I will instruct myself in the extent of the various precious mantras, O Protector.🔽Diseases, sufferings, and so forth, as well as the various obstacles,

original: gsang sngags rin chen 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
analyzed: gsang sngags rin chen 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
translated: Make the precious mantra fruitful!
